title: 62nd Martyrdom anniversary of Major Tufail Mohammad Shaheed observed
content:
RAWALPINDI, Aug 08 (APP): The 62nd Martyrdom anniversary of Major Tufail Mohammad Shaheed Nishan- E Haider was observed on Saturday.
In order to pay homage to supreme sacrifice in the line of duty, wreath laying ceremony was held at shaheedâ€™s native town Vehari, Punjab, said Inter Services Public Relations (ISPR) press release.
A wreath was laid on behalf of Chief of Army staff (COAS) General Qamar Javed Bajwa. A smartly turned out contingent of Pakistan Army presented guard of honour.
